message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.SD, cs.HC 

This paper is about building a persona-based conversation agent using multi-task learning approach to training neural conversation models. The paper focuses on natural language processing and machine learning, which are the main topics of the cs.CL (Computation and Language) category. Additionally, the paper proposes a novel approach to training neural conversation models, which falls under the scope of cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.LG (Machine Learning). The paper also discusses the benefits of the proposed approach in terms of capturing speakers' traits and speaking styles, which relates to the field of cs.SD (Sound and Music Computing). Finally, the paper addresses the challenge of building a persona-based conversation agent, which is relevant to the field of cs.HC (Human-Computer Interaction).
